page.title: 12A DAY WITH THE PARKER'S CONT
page.content: Then HURRAY! it was playtime. We were playing "Had" and Sophie dropped her peach and accidently stood on it. After play we did some more of our Domesday Project and began to put some of the work into the computer. When we had washed for lunch and said grace we all tucked into our lunches. I had peanut butter sandwiches and they were horrible. After lunch a lot of us went up onto the field with Mrs Corbett, our dinner lady, to play rounders. It was good fun even though our team lost again. When the bell was rung for afternoon school we all trooped in and I read my library book for about ten minutes. As it was Friday Mrs Webb came in to take some of the class for woodwork. The rest of us stayed in the classroom and did some observational painting
